words.source: H935 wayyiqtol 3mp Qal of בּוֹא 'to come, enter'; KJV 'came', ESV 'came', NASB 'came'
H7860 n.mp constr. of שֹׁטֵר 'officer, foreman'; KJV 'officers of', ESV 'foremen of', NASB 'foremen of'
H1121 n.mp constr. of בֵּן 'son'; KJV 'children of', ESV 'people of', NASB 'sons of'
H3478 proper name; all trans. agree
H6817 wayyiqtol 3mp Qal of צָעַק 'to cry out'; KJV 'cried', ESV 'cried', NASB 'cried out'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; all trans. agree
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H559 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. of אָמַר 'to say'; all trans. agree
H4100 prep. l- + interrog. pron. מָה 'what'; KJV 'wherefore', ESV 'why', NASB 'why'
H6213 Qal impf. 2ms of עָשָׂה 'to do, make'; KJV 'dealest thou', ESV 'do you treat', NASB 'do you deal'
H3541 adv. 'thus, so'; KJV 'thus', ESV 'this way', NASB 'this way'
H5650 prep. l- + n.mp constr. + 2ms suff. of עֶבֶד 'servant'; KJV 'with thy servants', ESV 'with your servants', NASB 'with your servants'
